footer.description: Transfer crypto easily through WhatsApp using our Web3 platform.

hero.legend: Transfer crypto easily through WhatsApp using our Web3 platform.

card-1.title: Make the blockchain complexity invisible
card-1.description: Hide passphrases, transaction approval pop-ups, and sponsor gas fees for transactions. We handle all the technical stuff for you.

card-2.title: Transfer money easily
card-2.description: Simply send a text message via WhatsApp to transfer, receive, swap and store value.

card-3.title: Rquest Payments effortlessly
card-3.description: Request Crypto payments via WhatsApp. Issue dynamic invoices, get paid in various currencies, and receive notifications on completion.

features.f1: Transfer funds to any WhatsApp contact
features.f2: Receive payments and transfers directly in your WhatsApp
features.f3: Easily swap between different tokens in a user-friendly way
features.f4: Securely hold your tokens while maintaining full control over your assets
features.f5: Dashboard for balance and transaction history tracking
features.f6-2: for supervising and managing user accounts
features.f13: Private key management with Account Abstraction Technology

ethereum.title: Ethereum
ethereum.description: Layer 1 Blockchain for smart contracts and decentralized applications. Ensures security for transactions.

scroll.title: Scroll
scroll.description: Layer 2 blockchain solution for Ethereum, offering faster and cheaper transactions. Designed to improve efficiency and usability.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Global messaging platform for communication. Provides secure messaging and easy integration with other services

openai.title: OpenAI
openai.description: AI platform that understands and generates human-like text. Powers advanced language processing and learning capabilities.

the-graph.title: The Graph
the-graph.description: Protocol for easily finding and accessing blockchain data. Simplifies data access for developers and users alike.

account-abstraction.title: Account Abstraction
account-abstraction.description: Concept allowing interaction with blockchains without needing specific cryptocurrencies. Enhances flexibility and usability for users.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.still-description: Please describe your case to receive the most accurate advice.

faq1.question: What is ChatterPay?
faq1.answer: ChatterPay is a Wallet for WhatsApp that integrates AI and Account Abstraction to allow any user to easily and securely manage funds on the blockchain without technical knowledge.

faq2.question: How can I create a wallet?
faq2.answer: To create a wallet, you can do it directly from the ChatterPay Bot on WhatsApp.

faq3.question: What are the fees associated with receiving payments?
faq3.answer: ChatterPay charges a 0.01% fee for each received transfer.

faq4.question: Can I swap between different tokens?
faq4.answer: Yes, you can swap between USDT, DAI, MATIC, ETH, BTC, ADA, and DOT without transaction limits.

faq5.question: How can I check my balance and transactions?
faq5.answer: You can check your balance and transactions at any time through our dashboard at https://chatterpay.vercel.app/.

faq6.question: What happens if I lose my tokens?
faq6.answer: The system is decentralized, and the user is entirely responsible for managing their accounts. We do not offer insurance or support in case of losses due to user error.

faq7.question: Where can I get more information about how to use ChatterPay?
faq7.answer: You can visit our WebApp at https://chatterpay.vercel.app/ for more information and future guides.

faq8.question: Where is my wallet's private key stored?
faq8.answer: Your private key is stored securely using Account Abstraction technology on a layer 2 blockchain called Scroll with the 'KeyStore' technology, ensuring high security and user control.

faq9.question: What can I do on the website?
faq9.answer: You can view your wallet balance, check your transaction history, see your wallet address, and view your user information.

faq10.question: How do I log in to the website?
faq10.answer: Enter your registered phone number. A 6-digit code will be sent to your phone for security; once you enter it, you will be able to access the site.

get-started.title: Get started with
get-started.description: All the power of Web3 with none of the hassle.
